# Coding

## Setup

```{r}

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

```

## Function

```{r}

cat_latin <- function(x) { #make sure parameters are correct
  if(!is.character(x)) { #make sure parameters are correct 
    stop("Sorry, this function only works on character vectors") 
  }
  x |>
   str_c("-meow") #put in needed code to a) move last letter to the front
}

```

## Examples

```{r}

#

cat_latin("cat")

#

y <- c("cat", "dog")

cat_latin(y)

#

cat_latin(1)

```
